Package com.mongodb.operation

Class FindAndDeleteOperation<T>

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.mongodb.operation.FindAndDeleteOperation<T>
  • Type Parameters:
    T - the operations result type.
    All Implemented Interfaces:
    AsyncWriteOperation<T>, WriteOperation<T>

    public class FindAndDeleteOperation<T>
extends Object
    An operation that atomically finds and deletes a single document.
    Since:
    3.0
    MongoDB documentation
    findAndModify
